Faults.message: We’re sorry for the loss of supply. We currently have a fault affecting the areas listed. Our engineers are on site working hard to get the power back on as quickly as they can. If you need more information, please call us on 105 or send us a message on Facebook or Twitter (@ssencommunity) and quote reference 'KP0394'

Faults.name: W3 Area

Faults.message: We're very sorry for the power cut affecting your area. Storm Otto is has caused damage to our network and this has resulted in several power cuts across Scotland. Our teams are working hard to get your power restored and after assessing the extent of the damage, believe they will have your power restored by the time provided above. We know this is a long time and if we can restore power sooner, we will. Thank you for your ongoing patience and understanding. You can follow our latest updates too at www.ssen.co.uk/storm/.

Faults.name: AB42 Area

Faults.message: We're sorry for the power cut affecting your area. Due to Storm Otto bringing high wind speeds across our network, it means we're experiencing a higher number of faults than normal. It also means it's not safe for us to complete repairs at this time and we also need to assess the extent of damage caused to then be able to restore your power. At this stage, we're unable to provide an estimated time of restoration, however, our teams are working as hard as they can to assess the situation and provide you with a realistic timescale. Once we've assessed the situation, we'll add the expected restoration time here, so please register for updates on this fault and we'll let you know if anything changes. You can follow our latest updates too at wwww.ssen.co.uk/storm/.
